explanation: Director, Actor, Playwright, and Stage Manager are all integral roles involved in the creation, rehearsal, and live performance of a stage play. The Audience observes and experiences the play, but is not a participant in its production.

category: Seven Wonders of the Ancient World
explanation: The Great Pyramid of Giza, Hanging Gardens of Babylon, Statue of Zeus at Olympia, and Temple of Artemis at Ephesus are all traditionally listed as four of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World. The Colosseum, while an iconic ancient Roman structure, is not part of this specific list.

Stained glass, the nave (main body), buttresses (often flying buttresses), and gargoyles are all iconic architectural features of Gothic cathedrals. A minaret, however, is a distinctive tower found in mosque architecture.
